MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float64 MetersToUSSurveyFeet(float64 meters) cil managed
Public Shared Function MetersToUSSurveyFeet (meters As Double) As Double

Docs.param: To be added.
Docs.summary: Exactly 1200/3937 meters by definition. In decimal terms approximately 0.304 800 609 601 219 meters. Variation from the common international foot of exactly 0.3048 meters may only be considerable over large survey distances.
